title: Yuranus Infra Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 2.93 crore, down 58.45% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Yuranus Infrastructure are:Net Sales at Rs 2.93 crore in December 2025 down 58.45% from Rs. 7.05 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 0.25 crore in December 2025 up 196.73% from Rs. 0.26 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 0.51 crore in December 2025 up 525% from Rs. 0.12 crore in December 2024. Yuranus Infra EPS has increased to Rs. 0.71 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.73 in December 2024. Yuranus Infra shares closed at 143.60 on January 12, 2026 (BSE) and has given 140.70% returns over the last 6 months and 70.73% over the last 12 months.
